name: ITRVL_BKG_PKG_CHRG_VW
description: The charge split up for the package

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.comment: Foreign Key to Package Booking Table .

columns.name: SUPER_PNR_NO
columns.comment: Super PNR Number  : Stores the super pnr number which holds the package booking .

columns.name: CHARGE_LEVEL
columns.comment: Indicates the charge level. Varies for each domain. eg: per night, per pax etc. .

columns.name: CHARGE_TYPE
columns.comment: Stores the type of charge - FARE, ROOMCHARGE, TAX, SURCHARGE etc. .

columns.name: CURRENCY
columns.comment: Stores the currency associated with the charge .

columns.name: BASE_PRICE
columns.comment: Stores the base amount associated with the charge type .

columns.name: DISCOUNT
columns.comment: Stores the discount associated with the charge type .

columns.name: GROSS_PRICE
columns.comment: Stores the gross amount associated with the charge type .

columns.name: NET_PRICE
columns.comment: "Stores the net amount associated with the charge type" .

columns.name: COMMISSIONABLE_IND
columns.comment: Stores whether the charge is commissionable or not .

columns.name: AGENCY_COMMISSION
columns.comment: Stores the agency commission associated with the charge .

columns.name: VENDOR_COMMISSION
columns.comment: Stores the vendor commission associated with the charge .

columns.name: MARK_UP
columns.comment: Stores the MarkUp associated with the charge .

columns.name: PAX_ID
columns.comment: Stores the Passenger ID associated with the charge .

columns.name: BASE_COST
columns.comment: Stores base cost associated with the charge type .

columns.name: COMPANY_ID
columns.comment: Stores whetehe the charge is added manually or from pring module .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_SUP_COST
columns.comment: Stores the original cost obtained from the supplier before applying supplier promotions if any .

columns.name: SUPPLIER_DISCOUNT
columns.comment: Stores the discount applied via supplier promotions if any .

columns.name: COST_VDR_CUR
columns.comment: This holds the base cost in vendor currency .

columns.name: BASE_PRC_VDR_CUR
columns.comment: This holds the base price in vendor currency .

columns.name: EXCHG_RATE_TO_PRC_CUR
columns.comment: This holds the exchange rate of vendor currency to pricing currency .

columns.name: VENDOR_COMM_OVERRIDDEN_IND
columns.comment: Indicates whether the vendor commission has been overridden .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_VENDOR_COMM_AMT
columns.comment: Stores the original vendor commission amount before any overriding has been performed .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_VENDOR_COMM_PCT
columns.comment: Stores the original vendor commission percentage before any overriding has been performed .

columns.name: VAT_CODE
columns.comment: Stores the value added tax code applied .

columns.name: PRICE_SERVICETAX_PCT
columns.comment: Stores the customer service tax percentage .

columns.name: COST_SERVICETAX_PCT
columns.comment: Stores the supplier service tax percentage .

columns.name: COMMISSION_SERVICETAX_PCT
columns.comment: Stores the commission service tax percentage .

columns.name: TC_COMMISSION
columns.comment: Tour Conductor Commission calculated by Scheduler .

columns.name: SERVICETAX_LEVELCODE
columns.comment: Stores the service tax level code .

columns.name: TC_DISCOUNT
columns.comment: Tour Conductor Discount calculated by Scheduler .

columns.name: ADJUSTED_AMOUNT
columns.comment: Stores the ADJUSTED_AMOUNT in case of price/discount overrider .

columns.name: STD_COMMISSION_PERCENT
columns.comment: Stores the standard agency commission percentage .

columns.name: BONUS_COMMISSION_PERCENT
columns.comment: Stores the bonus agency commission percentage .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_STD_COMMISSION
columns.comment: Stores the original standard agency commissionr .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_BONUS_COMMISSION
columns.comment: Stores the original bonus agency commissionr .

columns.name: ORIGINAL_BONUS_COMM_PERCENT
columns.comment: Stores the original bonus agency commission percentage .

columns.name: PRICE_TAX_CLSFCN

columns.name: IS_TAX_INCL_PRICE

columns.name: IS_TAX_INCL_COST

name: ITRVL_BKG_PKG_ITEM_ROUTE_VW
description: Table to store package item route details(for Transfer and AIR)

columns.name: ITEM_SEQUENCE
columns.comment: Itinerary sequence number of transfer in this route .

columns.name: START_DAY
columns.comment: Start day of the transfer item in this route .

columns.name: END_DAY
columns.comment: End day of the transfer item in this route .

columns.name: TRIP_TYPE
columns.comment: Type of trip. Possible values are O/R (Oneway/Round trip) .

name: ITRVL_BKG_PKG_ITEM_VW
description: Details of Package Items

columns.name: SEQUENCE_NO
columns.comment: Sequence number of the item in the itinerary .

columns.name: ITEM_TYPE
columns.comment: Item type of the item in the itinerary .

columns.name: ITEM_CODE
columns.comment: Item code of the item in the itinenary .

columns.name: SOURCE_TYPE
columns.comment: Source type of the item (G - Generic/C - Catalogued in iTravel/I - Interface) .

columns.name: IS_LEAD_ITEM
columns.comment: Indicates if the item is lead or not .

columns.name: CATEGORY_CODE
columns.comment: Item Category or Rate plan code .

columns.name: SUBS_GRP_CODE
columns.comment: Substitutable Group code to which this Item belongs .

columns.name: IS_REMOVED
columns.comment: Indicates whether the item is removed as part of amendment flow .

columns.name: IS_FLEXIBLE
columns.comment: Indicates if the item is flexible or not. The value will be true for flexible item and false for fixed item .

columns.name: RATE_PLAN
columns.comment: Rate Plan code as selected by the user .

columns.name: ITEM_REF_ID
columns.comment: Unique identifier to identify each item/item offer uniquely across package shopping/booking/amendment flows .

name: ITRVL_BKG_PKG_MAIN_VW
description: Table to store the package booking master data

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.comment: Stores the component id which uniquely identifies the package component .

columns.name: TENANT_ID
columns.comment: Stores the tenant id of user who created the booking .

columns.name: SUPER_PNR_NO
columns.comment: Stores the super pnr number which holds the package booking .

columns.name: PACKAGE_CODE
columns.comment: Stores the package code of the package .

columns.name: PACKAGE_NAME
columns.comment: Stores the name of the package .

columns.name: PKG_DEP_DATE_TIME
columns.comment: Stores the departure date and time of the package .

columns.name: CURRENCY_CODE
columns.comment: Stores the currency of the package .

columns.name: COMPANY_ID
columns.comment: Stores the company id for the booking .

columns.name: RATE_PLAN
columns.comment: Stores the rate plan code of the package .

columns.name: HUB_CODE
columns.comment: Stores the hub code of the package . Not in scope

columns.name: LEAD_PKG_IND
columns.comment: Indicates whether a pkg is lead or variation  . Not in scope

columns.name: PRICE_METHODOLOGY
columns.comment: Possible Values are "P" Price-roll up "C" Cost roll up "D" Direct pricing .

columns.name: ITIN_CODE
columns.comment: itinerary code of the package . ITIN_CODE refers to the package itinerary code. Whereas, LEAD_ITEM_CODE refers to the product code of the lead item within package. For eg, if cruise is the lead item in package, this refers to the cruise code.

columns.name: IS_APPORTION_APPLIED
columns.comment: Stores as TRUE if Price apportion is done else as FALSE . Not in scope

columns.name: SLCT_AIRPORT_CODES
columns.comment: Airport codes selected by pax to fly from .

columns.name: LEAD_ITEM_FARECLS
columns.comment: HOLDS FARE CLASS OF LEAD ITEM .

columns.name: LEAD_ITEM_RATEPLAN_TYPE
columns.comment: HOLDS THE RATEPLAN TYPE OF LEAD ITEM .

columns.comment: This column stores the date on which the record was last modified .

columns.comment: This column stores the user id who modified the record last .

columns.comment: This column stores the status if the master 1: ACTIVE 0: INACTIVE 2: DELETE .
